question: Which district has become the India's first district to have 100% solar powered health centres?
explanation: The Surat district of Gujarat has become the India\'s first district to have 100% solar powered Primary Health Centers (PHCs) to combat the issue of global warming. There are a total of 52 PHCs in the district and all of them are now powered by solar system. This initiative will not only bring down the electricity bill by 40% but also help fight global warming.
